skill.summary: Generates NotebookLM YAML configurations and slide design specifications for documentation projects
skill.author: Chachamaru127

security_audit.summary: Static scanner flagged YAML frontmatter, markdown syntax, and design documentation as security risks. Manual review confirms all findings are false positives. The skill generates documentation templates containing YAML configurations for NotebookLM and slide design specifications. No actual shell commands, cryptographic operations, or network calls for data exfiltration exist. The content consists solely of design documentation and reference URLs to external tutorials.

content.value_statement: Users need structured YAML configurations for NotebookLM documentation and slide presentations. This skill generates production-ready YAML files with design specifications tailored to different use cases.
actual_capabilities: Generates NotebookLM YAML configuration files for document processing
Creates slide design YAML with two style variations (minimal corporate and editorial story)
Asks clarifying questions to customize output for specific use cases
Produces Japanese YAML output compatible with NotebookLM customization features
limitations: Only generates documentation files, does not create or modify source code
Does not execute shell commands or perform file system operations outside the skill
Output is limited to YAML format for NotebookLM compatibility
Cannot integrate with external APIs or services beyond providing reference links

use_cases.title: Create NotebookLM YAML Configuration
use_cases.description: Generate a YAML file optimized for NotebookLM document processing with metadata, tool configurations, and processing instructions.
use_cases.target_user: Technical writers creating AI-assisted documentation workflows

use_cases.title: Design Slide Presentation Templates
use_cases.description: Produce two alternative slide design specifications (corporate minimal and editorial story) with color palettes, typography, and layout rules.
use_cases.target_user: Presenters and trainers preparing materials for NotebookLM slide generation

use_cases.title: Customize Documentation for Specific Audiences
use_cases.description: Answer a brief questionnaire to generate audience-specific documentation with appropriate tone, visual design, and branding elements.
use_cases.target_user: Business professionals tailoring documentation for different stakeholders

prompt_templates.title: Basic NotebookLM YAML Generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a NotebookLM YAML configuration file for my documentation project. The topic is [describe your documentation topic].
prompt_templates.scenario: When user wants a simple YAML configuration without customization

prompt_templates.title: Customized YAML with Audience Parameters
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a NotebookLM YAML configuration with the following parameters: purpose is [corporate/internal/investor], audience is [technical/non-technical/mixed], tone is [formal/casual/professional].
prompt_templates.scenario: When user provides specific audience and purpose details

prompt_templates.title: Slide Design Specification Generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate slide design YAML specifications for [presentation topic]. I need two variations: one for [corporate/business context] and one for [creative/storytelling context].
prompt_templates.scenario: When user needs slide design configurations for NotebookLM

prompt_templates.title: Complete Documentation Package
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a complete documentation package including both NotebookLM YAML configuration and slide design specifications. My project involves [describe project] targeting [describe audience] with [describe tone/preferences].
prompt_templates.scenario: When user needs comprehensive documentation templates

output_examples.input: Generate a NotebookLM YAML configuration for API documentation
Create slide designs for a quarterly business review

best_practices: Provide clear context about your documentation topic and target audience for better YAML customization
Use the two-variation slide design to compare different visual approaches before finalizing
Include specific color codes, fonts, and brand elements when requesting custom designs
anti_patterns: Do not ask this skill to write or modify application source code
Do not expect network connectivity or API integration from this skill
Do not rely on this skill for deployment or infrastructure tasks

faq.question: What file formats does this skill generate?
faq.answer: This skill generates YAML files specifically formatted for NotebookLM customization features. Output is text-based YAML that can be copied directly into NotebookLM.

faq.question: Can I use this skill for code documentation?
faq.answer: This skill creates configuration documentation for NotebookLM. For source code documentation (like JSDoc, docstrings), use a coding-focused skill instead.

faq.question: How do I use the slide design YAML in NotebookLM?
faq.answer: Open your source in NotebookLM, click Slides, then Customize Slides. Paste the YAML output into the customization description field and click Generate.

faq.question: What is the difference between the two slide design variations?
faq.answer: Ê°àA (Minimal Corporate) prioritizes readability and professional appearance with clean layouts. Ê°àB (Editorial Story) emphasizes emotional impact and visual storytelling with more whitespace and lifestyle aesthetics.

faq.question: Can I customize the generated YAML further?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill accepts parameters for purpose, audience, tone, and brand elements. You can also manually edit the generated YAML to add specific requirements.

faq.question: Does this skill connect to external services?
faq.answer: No. This skill generates documentation locally without network calls. Reference URLs in the output are informational links to external tutorials only.
